scripts.setup:local:ddb: mkdir -p .dbdata && yarn start && yarn ddb:wait && yarn ddb:init
scripts.ddb:wait: until nc -z localhost 8062; do sleep 1; done && echo "DynamoDB started" && sleep 2
scripts.ddb:init: aws dynamodb create-table --cli-input-json file://schema.json --endpoint-url http://localhost:8062 --region ap-southeast-1 --output text --query 'Table.TableName'
